userPresetResponses.content: Hey Analia, I have finished my tasks. I will close my shift for today.
Did the boss ever notify you about something I talked to him about?
I will be gone for a few hours, I have something urgent to do.

analia.1: Excellent. I will mark that down.
analia.2: Aww, that's so sweet. Thank you for the gesture.
analia.3: Yes, he let me know. I immediately took note of it.
analia.4: Don't worry, I'll cover your shift.
